entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 1.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
